H0.text: What body-part and lubricant are a traditional metaphor for physical effort such as scrubbing and polishing. Knee Oil

H1.text: What body-part and lubricant are a traditional metaphor for physical effort such as scrubbing and polishing. Shoulder Balm

H2.text: What body-part and lubricant are a traditional metaphor for physical effort such as scrubbing and polishing. Back Sweat

H3.text: What body-part and lubricant are a traditional metaphor for physical effort such as scrubbing and polishing. Elbowgrease

A4.text: Elbow grease is an idiom for manual labor and/or the process of working hard to accomplish an objective.
